name: Square Enix Forums Dark Blue
description:
*** Under Construction ***
*** NOTICE ***
This site's CSS is changing on the server.  I just remade this theme (see below for timeline).  Though it could change / break at any time.  I'll be keeping an eye on it.

Some of my favorite games / game mods documented here.  Couldn't stand the friggin white CSS.

NOTE: Most other pages on the square-enix.com domain are not themed.  Just the forums, and forum search.  Still working on "Advanced Search".  I may update this in the future.

user.name: TheArkive
user.about:
I just theme stuff as I get to it, or as it annoys me...

The more it annoys me, the higher on the priority it gets to be themed!

I'll take requests, but I can't promise deadlines.

=======================

My style is always dark and easier on the eyes (been on a Dark Blue kick lately).  I prefer to have rows highlight on hover on almost every table.  I like buttons to do the same.
